title: About
html:
Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
kevinvovn@gmail.com

Personal Summary

I am an enthusiastic technical architect (was a CIO) & project builder (was a startup founder), who always works with full passion and responsibility. I’m very strong in web & mobile development and have some big projects which serve millions of users.

I have founded a startup company in 3 years but unfortunately it failed. Also I was the CIO of a Singaporean startup company in 2 years. And was the technical leader in many international teams (Invygo, Active For Good, Feedlestack, Yojee, LittleLives, etc). Currently, I’m spending my free time researching some areas such as: iPaaS, AI and learning new things (in software development or other areas such as: business, etc). I’m always eager to learn new things.

High achievements

  • The senior full stack developer and the mobile team leader in Invygo - a Dubai startup for car subscription which has been raised $2M funding and has more than 50k users.
  • Founded Pippip - a social network for fashion lovers with more than 20k users in 3 years.
  • Founded React Native Vietnam - a Facebook group for 18k+ developers.
  • Founded Flutter Vietnam - a Facebook group for 9k+ developers.
  • Built the MadPaws.com.au - Airbnb for pet - from scratch as a team leader for more than 3 years and reached 50k users around Australia. From 2014 - 2016, I worked as a Project Manager and Technical Specialist in MadPaws.
  • The best member of the month 12 times in 18 months at TMA Solutions company.
  • Delivered 16 projects successfully as project manager, technical architect and had been promoted to Chief Information Officer within 2 years in Antking.
  • Delivered LittleStories application for more than 2000+ schools in the LittleLives ecosystem.
  • Have 5 open-source projects with more than 300+ stars on Github

Business Ideas I have worked on

  • Car subscription
  • Car insurance
  • Fitness
  • Health management
  • Logistics solution
  • News aggregator
  • Sharing economy
  • Social network
  • E-commerce
  • Oil industry
  • Classes management

Skills

  • Very good in idea brainstorming, and plan for the Minimum viable product (timeline and features) to make sure we can meet the business deadline but still can have the best quality.
  • Be able to quickly understand the product/application business and design the architecture for the whole system.
  • Very good in leading the team with different areas (e.g: Design, Developers, QA, BA, etc) and project management.
  • Good problem-solving skill.
  • Ability to think strategically and act tactically.
  • Ability to perform in ambiguous situations.
  • Good at constructing Backend Architecture and management front-end that can support vast concurrent users at once.

Technical Knowledge

  • Very good in architecture design, algorithm, optimization, etc
  • Key back-end languages: Elixir (Phoenix), Javascript (NodeJS). Have been worked in many programming languages/frameworks such as Go, PHP, and Python
  • Front-end: VanillaJS, ReactJS, VueJS
  • Mobile: React Native, Flutter (cross platform), Objective-C/Swift/C++ (iOS), Java/C++ (Android)
  • Databases: SQL & NoSQL
  • OS: Unix, Mac, Windows
  • Networking: TCP/UDP/UDP-reliable, HTTP/HTTPS, RTMP, XMPP, WebRTC
  • Cloud: AWS, Google, DigitalOcean, Azure
  • Unit testing: TDD, BDD
  • Continuous Integration & Continuous Delivery for both web & mobile: Docker, Vagrant, Nanobox, CircleCI, GitlabCI, Bitrise, etc
  • Strong in Git process
  • RabbitMQ, Kafka, Redis
  • Grafana, Prometheus, Kibana
  • Selenium, Appium
  • Firebase, CustomerIO, Mixpanel, Intercom, Adjust, Sentry, Bugsnag, etc
  • ...and learning new things every week.
